Value.label: User custom mode LED animations
Value.Help: User custom mode for LED animations

Value.label: Set the rate of change to next color in Custom Mode
Value.Help: Set the rate of change to next color in Custom Mode.

Value.label: Set color that LED Bulb blinks
Value.Help: Set color that LED Bulb blinks in Blink Mode.

Value.label: Ramp rate when dimming using Multilevel Switch
Value.Help: Specifying the ramp rate when dimming using Multilevel Switch V1 CC in 100ms.

Value.label: Notification
Value.Help: Enable to send notifications to associated devices (Group 1) when the state of LED Bulb is changed.

Value.label: Warm White temperature
Value.Help: Adjusting the color temperature in warm white color component. available value: 2700k to 4999k

Value.label: cold white temperature
Value.Help: Adjusting the color temperature in cold white color component. available value:5000k to 6500k
